group_1.textRight: Maria!@Sorry to have kept you waiting...

group_1.textLeft: It's alright, I'm the one who called for this after all.
C'mon, have a seat.

group_1.textRight: Thanks.
...Um, what's up?

group_1.textLeft: Hagumu, have you been eating well?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: You don't look so good...
You know, over at Hinano, Yachiyo, and@Kanagi's places...
Girls who used to be in the Wings of the Magius...@ex-Feathers, I think they're called?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right...

group_1.textLeft: Those girls and other inexperienced kids@come seeking advice.
It seems they're worried about how to@handle things going forward...

group_1.textRight: (...Just like me... )
(But if I went there, they might try to@have me join the Union again... )

group_1.textLeft: I apologize if this is too much of an intrusion, but...
I heard that you were in the Wings of the Magius.
Hagumu, I wanted to see if you were doing okay.

group_1.textRight: Maria...

group_1.textLeft: If by any chance, there's something you want to@talk about, can you tell me?
I might not have answers for you, but...
It might be easier than keeping the burden@all to yourself.

group_1.textRight: ...I got a call from the Kamihama Magia Union.
I don't think the idea of liberation is bad...
But...um...there's just one thing@I can't agree with...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?

group_1.textRight: And also, my friend Shigure...@She asked me to do something else...
But, I can't go her way...
...because of the Magius situation...
It's not quite about whether or not I can@forgive them...

group_1.textLeft: Is it that somewhere in your heart, you feel@"I don't want to do this"?

group_1.textRight: Ah... That's right.
There are times where I have felt that way...
But at the same time...@I do understand what Shigure is trying to say...
...[wait:1][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]That's why...
It always...just stops there...

group_1.textLeft: That's not all you want though, is it?

group_1.textRight: It's not...

group_1.textLeft: So you don't know how to decide?

group_1.textRight: Eh?

group_1.textLeft: The proposals from the Kamihama Magia Union@and your friend,
they both have good and bad points.
I wonder if you could compare them and@decide that way...

group_1.textRight: Hearing you put it like that, you might be right...
But...[chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]@I still don't know what to do...

group_1.textLeft: Of course... If you can't come to an@answer on your own,
maybe it's a good idea to talk to other@people to get a reference.

group_1.textRight: Other people?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Ask them, "How did you decide?"

group_1.textRight: Ah...! I should...
By the way, Maria, how did you decide?
You joined the Kamihama Magia Union,@didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
But you know, there wasn't really any@reason for me to decline.

group_1.textRight: What?!@That was it...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad it's becoming easier to be active@as a Magical Girl,
with the Purification System expanding to@create a world without Witch transformations...
...I suppose that's all?@I just think it's a good thing.
I don't want to become a Witch, nor do@I want anyone else to become one.

group_1.textRight: ...I just...don't think I can be the same...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Well, you could say I simply@went with the flow,
so maybe I'm not a good example to follow.

group_1.textRight: T-that's not what I meant...!@I'm not like you, Maria...
I don't have it all together the way you do...
(Making decisions on the spot never@ends well for me...)
(...Like when I became a Magical Girl.)

group_1.textLeft: Don't say that.
You know, Hagumu...
You do have a lot of good qualities.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?@Is that so...?

group_1.textLeft: Well then, shall we eat?@The food might have gotten a little cold,
but it's tough to lift our spirits on an@empty stomach.

group_1.textCenter: Why is it that...I never do anything but@flounder around, feeling lost...?
